Server.Name: ExcitusXtremeV4
Server.Description:
ExcitusXtremeV4 Attention this version of ExcitusXtreme only runs under Alpha19 Stable *IMPORTANT!! You need start own map (ExcitusXtreme8K) or new random world You have not all the Prefabs in your Random World but in own map
installation Server download the link below and copy it in this structure on your server
https://git.memolp.de/MeMoLP/ExcitusXtremeV4
Description *V4 takes place in germany. Cars, POIs are like in Germany *over 110 new POIs *Biger Backpack *Completly new Loot Tempaltes *New Zombies *Powerfull Auger Nailgun... *Radiation *Snake Venom *Walk different on Biomes *New German Weapons G36, MP7, P99 *New Worbenches, Campfires, Forge... *New vegetables *New Food *New Agriculture with pigs, cows... *and a lot more
You can find support and descriptions at: https://memolp.de
Information for this version can you find under: https://memolp.de/forum/excitusxtreme/release
Credits *thanks to Houzi, Fuffel, RactonLP LiiirumLarum *MeanCloud for Cooper and Zink *Sirillion for Z2 â€“ HUD *and everyone else I forgot
